author: Agence France-Presse
title: China’s coronavirus epicentre eases travel restrictions after lockdown
description: People stranded elsewhere are allowed to enter Wuhan.
content:
Trains packed with thousands of passengers arrived in Wuhan on Saturday as the Chinese city that was Ground Zero for the global coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic partly reopened after months in lockdown.
Returnees, some wearing two face masks, latex gloves and… [+1338 chars]
